players.name: Bob
memory: You: "I'm shocked by Alice's sudden demise. We should all be on high alert and work together to identify the culprit."
Charlie: "Bob is the mafioso. I investigated him last night and confirmed it. We need to vote him out."
Diana: "Charlie's claim is very bold. Bob, do you have any response to the accusation?"
Diana: "Charlie, if you're the detective, can you give us more details about your investigation process? Bob, is there anything else you want to say in your defense?"
Charlie: "There's no time for ambiguity. Trust my investigation, Bob is the mafioso. We need to act swiftly and vote him out before he takes down another of us."
